mapper.select:
SELECT s.id, s.dict_name dictName, s.dict_code dictCode, s.dict_type dictType, s.status, s.remark, CONCAT_WS('_', b.job_number, b.user_name) createName, CONVERT(s.create_time, char) createTime, CONCAT_WS('_', c.job_number, c.user_name) lastUpdateName, CONVERT(s.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM sys_dict_type s LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON s.create_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff c ON s.last_update_id = c.user_id
AND s.dict_name LIKE '%${dictName}%'
AND s.dict_code LIKE '%${dictCode}%'
ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
